content: Any feedback on tihs PR #14465 would be very welcome. Some earlier discussion took place at https://leanprover.zulipchat.com/#narrow/stream/116395-maths/topic/ideals.20in.20non-comm.20rings/near/291719534
I left two very minor comments. I tried hard to think about it, and it seems to make sense to me. But, as I noted in my review, this is pretty far afield from my usual realm of knowledge.
Thanks, those are good comments and I have applied them.
Needless to say I also think this makes sense :-)
